trans-unit.source: such as node.offsetLeft, node.offsetTop, node.style.left and node.style.top. The offset is always (2, 2) in LTR direction. When the body is in RTL direction, the offset counts the width of left scroll bar's width. This function computes the actual offset.
trans-unit.target: 如 node.offsetLeft、node.offsetTop、node.style.left 和 node.style.top。在LTR方向上,偏移量总是(2,2)。当主体在RTL方向时,偏移量计算的是左滚动条的宽度。这个函数计算实际的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: sync up the node list with the data map
trans-unit.target: 将节点列表与数据映射同步。

trans-unit.source: takes a name/value mapping object and returns a string representing a URL-encoded version of that object.
trans-unit.target: 接受一个名称/值映射对象,并返回一个代表该对象的URL编码版本的字符串。

trans-unit.source: tearDown() is not called automatically. In normal use, the Setter instance properties are simply allowed to fall out of scope but the tearDown method can be called to explicitly reset this instance.
trans-unit.target: tearDown()不会被自动调用。在正常使用中,只是让Setter实例属性脱离范围,但可以调用 tearDown方法来显式重置这个实例。

trans-unit.source: template: Boolean: If true, ignores ContentPane's stopParser flag and parses contents inside of a ContentPane inside of a template. This allows dojoAttachPoint on widgets/nodes nested inside the ContentPane to work.
trans-unit.target: 模板,如果为真,则忽略ContentPane的stopParser标志,并在模板中解析ContentPane内的内容。Boolean:如果为true,忽略ContentPane的stopParser标志,并在模板中解析ContentPane内的内容。这允许dojoAttachPoint在嵌套在ContentPane内的widgets/nodes上工作。

trans-unit.source: the 9 standard properties: query, onBegin, onItem, onComplete, onError scope, sort, start, and count. Some implementations may accept additional properties in the keywordArgs object as valid parameters, such as {includeOutliers:true}.
trans-unit.target: 9个标准属性:query、onBegin、onItem、onComplete、onError scope、sort、start和count。一些实现可以接受关键字Args对象中的附加属性作为有效参数,例如{includeOutliers:true}。

trans-unit.target: 要格式化的日期和/或时间。如果只格式化时间,年、月、日字段中的值是不相关的。当只格式化日期时,情况正好相反。

the first node in this dojo/NodeList
the last node in this dojo/NodeList
trans-unit.target: 这个dojo/NodeList中的最后一个节点。

trans-unit.source: the manager of DnD operations (usually a singleton)
the name of the attribute to get or set.
trans-unit.target: 要获取或设置的属性名称。

the name of the attribute to remove
the name of the attribute to set, or a hash of key-value pairs to set.

trans-unit.source: the name of the method to attach to. For DOM events, this should be the lower-case name of the event
trans-unit.target: 要附加到的方法的名称,对于DOM事件,这应该是事件的小写名称。对于DOM事件,这应该是事件的小写名称

trans-unit.source: the name of the property to get.
the name of the property to set, or a hash object to set multiple properties at once.

the original object argument to the IO call.

trans-unit.target: 使用CSS选择器进行同样的过滤

the source which has the mouse over it

trans-unit.target: 要求的属性值或其默认值。

trans-unit.source: the value to set for the attribute, if the name is a string.
trans-unit.target: 要为属性设置的值,如果名称是字符串。

trans-unit.source: this function can handle all 4 CSS3 Color Module formats: rgb, rgba, hsl, hsla, including rgb(a) with percentage values.
trans-unit.target: 这个函数可以处理所有4种CSS3颜色模块格式。rgb,rgba,hsl,hsla,包括带有百分比值的rgb(a)。

trans-unit.source: this function is called once, when mouse is out of our container
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标离开我们的容器时,这个函数被调用一次。

trans-unit.source: this function is called once, when mouse is over our container
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标移到我们的容器上时,这个函数被调用一次。

trans-unit.source: time to delay before allowing cb to call again.
trans-unit.target: 在允许cb再次呼叫之前,需要延迟一段时间。

trans-unit.source: times only, with an optional time zone appended
trans-unit.target: 仅限时间,可选择附加时区。

trans-unit.source: timezones may be specified as Z (for UTC) or +/- followed by a time expression HH:mm Assumes the local time zone if not specified. Does not validate. Improperly formatted input may return null. Arguments which are out of bounds will be handled by the Date constructor (e.g. January 32nd typically gets resolved to February 1st) Only years between 100 and 9999 are supported.
trans-unit.target: 时区可以指定为Z(对于UTC)或+/-,后面跟着一个时间表达式HH:mm 如果没有指定,则假设当地时区。不生效。格式不正确的输入可能会返回null。超出范围的参数将由Date构造函数处理(例如,1月32日通常会被解析为2月1日)。

trans-unit.source: to hold down the 'a' key immediately, call robot.keyDown('a')
to press shift-tab immediately, call robot.keyPress(dojo.keys.TAB, 0, {shift: true})
to release the 'a' key immediately, call robot.keyUp('a')

w = the sum of the left and right padding and border
when run over sparse arrays, the Dojo function invokes the callback for every index whereas JavaScript 1.6's indexOf skips the holes in the sparse array.

trans-unit.source: you may de-reference as far as you like down the package hierarchy. This is sometimes handy to avoid lengthy relative urls or for building portable sub-packages. In this example, the acme.widget and acme.util directories may be located under different roots (see dojo.registerModulePath) but the the modules which reference them can be unaware of their relative locations on the filesystem:
trans-unit.target: 您可以根据需要在包层次结构中取消引用。有时这很方便，可以避免使用冗长的相对URL或构建便携式子包。在此示例中， acme.widget 和 acme.util 目录可能位于不同的根目录下（请参阅 dojo.registerModulePath ），但是引用它们的模块可能不知道它们在文件系统上的相对位置：

trans-unit.source: {url: String} {data: jsonObject} {typeMap: object} The structure of the typeMap object is as follows:
